Name: Waifu Crush
About the game: Waifu Crush is a PvEvP match 3 game with a strong strategy element with many special items called Charms. You join the Super M3 Tournament's world where you meet and challenge all the Legendary Grandmasters to prove yourself! You fight and defeat AI girls to earn charm then use these charms creating your strategy and challenge other players via PvP feature. Features: HuniePop-like match 3 puzzle game with indirect matching mechanic (freely to move token in column and row) Charms system that allow to build your match 3 puzzle battle more strategy PvE system that allow to fight with smart AI girl PvP system that allow you duel with other player Proving yourself by get high much as you can in the ranked PvP mode
